tool.name: Descriptive Statistics
tool.command:
descriptiveStatistics.R #if str($CommunityFile).strip() != "": --CommunityFile="$CommunityFile" #end if #if str($Attributes).strip() != "": --Attributes="$Attributes" #end if #if str($OutputFile).strip() != "": --OutputFile="$OutputFile" #end if
2>&1

param.name: Attributes
param.help: Comma-separated names of SamplesFile columns on which descriptive statistics are to be calculated. Example: Nugent_2_group
param.label: Attributes

tool.help:
**Description**
Generate descriptive statistics about taxa and samples present in a CommunityFile.
